scenes.description: MC section where hololive English -Advent- celebrates their performance and heads towards the main stage.
Performance of 'Our Bright Parade (English ver.)' on a massive 3D stage.

subtitles.original: I've been running so long
subtitles.english: I've been running so long

subtitles.english: Don't rush it, chase me until

subtitles.original: Oh baby it makes me feel so...

subtitles.original: ADVENT-S! How was that performance?
subtitles.english: ADVENT-S! How was that performance?

subtitles.original: Did you like it?
subtitles.english: Did you like it?

subtitles.original: We're not criminals, we're idols, right?
subtitles.english: We're not criminals, we're idols, right?

subtitles.original: That was FANTASTIC!!
subtitles.english: That was FANTASTIC!!

subtitles.original: We need to show the world how amazing Advent is.
subtitles.english: We need to show the world how amazing Advent is.

subtitles.original: You can open the door now,
subtitles.english: You can open the door now,

subtitles.original: go, go!
subtitles.english: go, go!

subtitles.original: Are we ready, Advent?
subtitles.english: Are we ready, Advent?

subtitles.original: We're ready, Advent!
subtitles.english: We're ready, Advent!

subtitles.original: Okay, let's go!
subtitles.english: Okay, let's go!

subtitles.original: Let's go! Bau Bau!
subtitles.english: Let's go! Bau Bau!

subtitles.original: Alright, everyone's waiting for us, so let's go!
subtitles.english: Alright, everyone's waiting for us, so let's go!

subtitles.original: Yeah! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Parade, parade, parade, it's time to take the stage
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, it's time to take the stage

subtitles.original: I hear the voices calling out our name
subtitles.english: I hear the voices calling out our name

subtitles.original: Parade, parade, parade, a new journey awaits
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade, a new journey awaits

subtitles.original: Just hear the sound and we can start again
subtitles.english: Just hear the sound and we can start again

subtitles.original: Leaving only weightless echoes
subtitles.english: Leaving only weightless echoes

subtitles.original: I run because I heard a voice say go
subtitles.english: I run because I heard a voice say go

subtitles.original: Far away, let in all the darkness
subtitles.english: Far away, let in all the darkness

subtitles.original: It's a name shining for us to notice
subtitles.english: It's a name shining for us to notice

subtitles.original: Memories that fill us up with kindness and love
subtitles.english: Memories that fill us up with kindness and love

subtitles.original: You reach out and tell me...
subtitles.english: You reach out and tell me...
